question: Why is my butthole bleeding? Please help!!!!?
question_content: why is it bleeding? im 13 and am not sexually active so its not that... is it a period? i never had one before if that helps... so please explain!! Thank you for your time!!!

answers.answer_content: your butthole? hunny if ur bleeding its coming from your vag [the hole in the middle] and ya its your period haha good luck
